What happens to the human body before freezing to death explained
description: Extreme cold triggers a silent shutdown of the body. Initially, shivering and numbness give way to confusion and weakness as core temperature drops. The body's systems, including the brain and heart, progressively fail. This leads to a deceptive sense of peace before death, underscoring the critical need to recognize early hypothermia signs and act swiftly to prevent fatal outcomes.

This praise comes amidst political discussions involving youth engagement and electoral integrity.

title: Exclusive: Raashii gets candid about meeting Rekha after 120 Bahadur
description: Raashii Khanna reflects on the profound impact of '120 Bahadur', a war drama that deeply moved her. A highlight was meeting Rekha, who praised the film's emotional honesty and Raashii's portrayal of resilience. Preparing for the role involved connecting with the soldier's family, transforming the character into a profound responsibility and one of her most challenging yet grounding experiences.

Women are required to dress modestly, avoiding tight or transparent clothing. Employers must enforce these rules, facing penalties for non-compliance, aiming for a unified professional image nationwide.

title: It's Thanksgiving! Los Angeles freeways get buried in traffic — video goes viral
description: Thanksgiving travel chaos grips Los Angeles as the 405 Freeway transforms into a sea of red brake lights. These horrific accidents have exposed serious flaws in the state's sports infrastructure and governance, leading to the suspension of a district sports officer and calls for urgent reforms.

description: Hollywood's once-tight Blake Lively-Taylor Swift friendship appears strained, with Lively's recent social media silence fueling speculation. description: A Gurgaon resident has sent a legal notice to Haryana DGP OP Singh, calling his recent statement about Thar owners defamatory. The owner claims the DGP's remarks, suggesting Thar owners have 'twisted minds' and are 'goons', caused him humiliation and damaged the reputation of all Thar owners.

title: Struggling with high uric acid? Try these 2 herbs to help reduce it naturally
description: High uric acid can be managed with two common herbs, Clove and Aloe vera, according to Ayurveda Doctor Manisha Mishra. These herbs may help by inhibiting xanthine oxidase, the enzyme responsible for uric acid production, while also reducing inflammation and supporting kidney function.  Incorporating them into your routine could offer a natural approach to managing uric acid levels.

title: 'Only one will win': Mark Cuban warns AI giants— 'overspending bubble could pop'
description: Mark Cuban has cautioned major AI firms like OpenAI and Google against excessive spending in the race for the most powerful models. He likens the current AI arms race to the 1990s search engine boom, predicting a potential bubble and winner-take-all outcome. Cuban believes true disruption will emerge from unexpected breakthroughs, not just incremental improvements.
